original_text: After that they have borne their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they dwelt safely in their land, and none made them afraid.
korean_text: 그들이 그 땅에 평안히 거주하고 두렵게 할 자가 없게 될 때에 부끄러움을 품고 내게 범한 죄를 뉘우치리니

sentences.original_text: After that they have borne their shame
whereby they have trespassed against me
when they dwelt safely in their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 땅에 안전하게 거할 때
그리고 아무도 그들을 두렵게 하지 않았을 때
